Directions: After cleansing, apply booster evenly to face, neck and outer eye area. Use under any of your favorite serums and moisturizers, morning and night.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
